name: imsxmet
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, cfv(cxmet, c2)), wcel(c1, cfv(cmet, c2)))
stmt.pretty: syl(c0 ∈ NrmCVec, c1 ∈(*Met ` c2), c1 ∈(Met ` c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, cfv(cxmet, c2)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, cfv(cmet, c2)))
-| wi(wcel(c1, cfv(cmet, c2)), wcel(c1, cfv(cxmet, c2)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ NrmCVec → c1 ∈(*Met ` c2))
⊣ (c0 ∈ NrmCVec → c1 ∈(Met ` c2))
⊣ (c1 ∈(Met ` c2)→ c1 ∈(*Met ` c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, cfv(cxmet, c2)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, cfv(cmet, c2)))
-| wi(wcel(c1, cfv(cmet, c2)), wcel(c1, cfv(cxmet, c2)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ NrmCVec → c1 ∈(*Met ` c2))
⊣ (c0 ∈ NrmCVec → c1 ∈(Met ` c2))
⊣ (c1 ∈(Met ` c2)→ c1 ∈(*Met ` c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, cfv(cmet, c2)))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cba, c0))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cims, c0))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ NrmCVec → c1 ∈(Met ` c2))
⊣ c2 =(BaseSet ` c0)
⊣ c1 =(IndMet ` c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, cfv(cxmet, c2)))
-| wi(wcel(c1, cfv(cmet, c2)), wcel(c1, cfv(cxmet, c2)))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cba, c0))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cims, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ NrmCVec → c1 ∈(*Met ` c2))
⊣ (c1 ∈(Met ` c2)→ c1 ∈(*Met ` c2))
⊣ c2 =(BaseSet ` c0)
⊣ c1 =(IndMet ` c0)

body.origin: |- wi(wcel(c1, cfv(cmet, c2)), wcel(c1, cfv(cxmet, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, cfv(cxmet, c2)))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cba, c0))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cims, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ NrmCVec → c1 ∈(*Met ` c2))
⊣ c2 =(BaseSet ` c0)
⊣ c1 =(IndMet ` c0)

comment: The induced metric of a normed complex vector space is an extended metric space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Sep-2015.) (New usage is discouraged.)
